attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Trident is a complete waste of UK taxpayers money. The British people want among other things, better education, healthcare and transport. NO to replacing Trident. Billons can be better spent.

This petition calls on the Prime Minister not to replace the Trident nuclear weapons system, and to champion the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty."

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
